New Records: Austria conceded the fastest-ever goal in the knockout stage of a European Championship (57 seconds)
Key Match Events: Merih Demiral scored the opening goal for Turkey after 57 seconds due to comedic Austrian defending
Arda Guler provided the corner for Turkey's second goal, which was headed in by Merih Demiral
Post-Match Reflections: Ralf Rangnick, Austria manager, expressed disappointment about their elimination from the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: Plastic cups were thrown onto the pitch during the match, with Arda Guler and Marcel Sabitzer being targeted
Others: The match was described as frenetic and chaotic, with both teams displaying high energy and work rate
